label: A3B4_hR7_160_3a_4a-001
title: Sn$_{4}$As$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
Most earlier {\em e.g.} (Pearson, 1967) work places this in space group $R\overline{3}m$ \#166, in which case this would be in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_hR7_166_2c_ac-001}{Al$_{4}$C$_{3}$ ($D7_{1}$) structure}.  (Kovnir, 2009) argue that there is actually no inversion site, so the structure is as presented here, in space group $R3m$ \#160.  The two structures are very close -- if we allow a 0.1{\AA} uncertainty in the atomic positions the structure becomes $D7_{1}$.  As we already have that structure, we present the Kovnir {\em et al.} structure here. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
